table.name: vtiger_servicelevelagreement
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicelevelagreement` ( `servicelevelagreementid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `subject` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicelevelagreementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_servicelevelagreementcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicelevelagreementcf` ( `servicelevelagreementid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`servicelevelagreementid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
